translations: 据说，一般认为；根据风评

sentences.sentence: He reputedly earns two million dollars a year.
God, in the Muggle World, Magic is reputedly impossible!
sentences.translation: 上帝！在麻瓜的世界里，魔法还据说是不存在的呢！

sentences.sentence: Sam's interest tends towards the reputedly 'ugly' and predatory side of the sea.
sentences.translation: 山姆钟情于海洋所谓“丑陋”和弱肉强食的一面。
